amendment.description: Amendment sought to reinstate the Berry Amendment's longstanding domestic sourcing requirement for stainless steel flatware and sought to provide a one year phase-in period.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 115-702 to reinstate the Berry Amendment's longstanding domestic sourcing requirement for stainless steel flatware and provides a one year phase-in period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 226).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Tenney.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 239 (Roll no. 226).
